acts.name: The Call to Adventure
acts.description: Gather information about the goblin threat and recruit Elena to your party
objectives: Talk to Tom the barkeep about the goblin raids
Meet Elena and learn about the caravan raid
Recruit Elena to join your party
Investigate the forest path for goblin activity
Survive the goblin ambush in the forest

acts.name: Into the Darkness
acts.description: Infiltrate the goblin cave with Elena and fight through the guards
objectives: Locate the hidden goblin cave entrance
Defeat the entrance guards with Elena's help

acts.name: The Final Showdown
acts.description: Confront the goblin boss and end the raids once and for all
objectives: Reach the goblin boss's treasure room
Defeat the goblin boss with Elena's aid
Recover the stolen caravan goods and treasure
